name: Salesforce B2C Commerce (SFCC)
description:
Full featured support for Salesforce B2C Commerce (Salesforce Commerce Cloud / SFCC ) platform


There is a free 30 day trial!

No credit card required. You can simply install the plugin and use it for free for 30 days. After trial period you can make a payment decision.


The essential plugin for making working with Salesforce B2C Commerce (SFCC) easier than ever!


Full Features List | Documentation | Issue Tracker

-----

Slack | Contact us


ðŸš¨ Important

If you previously opened your project using Salesforce Commerce Cloud Studio, please remove .idea folder of your project and reopen the project. Otherwise it may lead to bunch of conflicts and errors.

ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ Requirements ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥

All dependencies are required so please, make sure you have installed following plugins:

  • JetBrains Properties

Features

Graphical Debugger


  • See how to set-up debugger
  • SDAPI 2.0 Support
  • Evaluation window
  • Values inline with code
  • Variables data on hover
  • Access variables outside closure
  • Debugger info console
  • Intellij IDEA Debugger experience
  • Changing Variables During Debugging

Custom Attributes and Custom Preferences

  • Autocompletion and Goto for Custom Attributes and Custom Preferences. See Details

WebDAV Explorer

  • Full featured WebDAV Explorer for Salesforce B2C Commerce. See Details

Full support of require('~/') and require('*/')

  • Time Saving feature.
    Correctly resolves references of required script, provides code autocompletion and goto features.

res.render(), app.getView().render() and ISML.renderTemplate() support.

  • Time Saving feature.
    Templates code completion and go to are available here. You can easily go to template right from the code just by clicking on it. If there are multiple variants, pop up with variants will be show.

SFRA Support

  • Autocompletion/Goto and full type resolving for:
    • server.js object in controllers
    • req and res objects
    • this.on() route events.
  • Custom icon for modules folder

B2C Commerce API Support

  • Autocompletion/goto and full type resolving for:
    • require().
      Example: require('dw/system/Site')
    • Direct access via dw package.
      Example: dw.system.Site
    • JSDoc(Documentation comments).
      Example: @param {dw.system.Site} siteObj. In this case siteObj will have reference to dw.system.Site
    • TopLevel.global

Extended dw.json Support


  • Multiple connections
  • Cartridges and Code versions autocompletion/goto
  • Cartridges and Code versions autocompletion/goto
  • "Go to" by clicking on hostname url
  • Manual and Auto updates of code versions

ISML support

  • Templates autocompletion/goto for ismodule, isinclude, isdecorate
  • Tags and attributes autocompletion
  • Correct parsing most of the tags (new ISML lexer and parser in development)

Other features

  • hooks.json scripts autocompletion
  • Cartridge labels for Autocompletion/Goto/Search Everywhere etc.
  • Async auto upload on file change
  • "Upload all cartridges" and other actions
  • New icons for folders and files for better user experience
